title: Innovating Mathematics Pedagogy Through Executive Coaching and Transformative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and understanding of educational experiences
context.additional_context: Enhancing Competencies for Integrating Innovative Teaching Methods into Educational Settings as Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can reflect on and redefine their own educational beliefs using an ontology-based coaching model.
Learners can recognize the limitations of traditional mathematics teaching methods and design new approaches by applying a transformative learning process.
Learners can improve teaching practices by sharing formative assessment feedback through peer coaching.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
